overview: Amir joined MoMinis in 2011 as VP Sales, bringing with him over 10 years of experience from the telecommunications and mobile industry. Prior to joining MoMinis, Amir held senior management and VP positions at companies such as Traffix Systems and InfoGin. In each role, he played an integral part in advancing the companyâ€™s business development and establishing key partnership with major global telecom companies and many other leading players in the mobile industry. Amir holds a Bachelors of Science degree in software engineering.
